titles.title: Let Us Take Another Step In Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let us take another step in Jesus
Let us move on in a little deeper
Let us climb the golden stair
Become the city that's four square.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When you feel the fire getting hotter
And the road keep getting harder
Then just take another step in Jesus
He's your life.
